underlying_goal: To execute a major overhaul of a research paper based on a spec document, reframing the core narrative and restructuring most sections.
friction_detail: During the final compilation, an undefined LaTeX reference was found, which the agent had to fix before the process could complete.
primary_success: Successfully executing a large-scale, systematic overhaul of a research paper, including rewriting the abstract and introduction, restructuring the results and limitations, and reframing the core contributions, all based on a provided specification.
brief_summary: Following a detailed spec, the agent performed a major overhaul of a research paper. This involved rewriting the introduction and abstract to reframe the main contribution, restructuring the experimental and results sections, and updating the conclusion to align with the new narrative. After a minor fix during compilation, the task was completed successfully.
